text: viśvāsa koṭa yahakam kaḷavun, ēvāṭa pahaḷin gaṁgā galā basnā (svarga) uyan valaṭa niyata vaśayenma allāh ætuḷat karayi. tavada pratikṣēpa kaḷavun vana ovuhu (dan̆ḍuvama) bhukti vin̆diti. tavada (molova bhukti vin̆dinnan) govipaḷa satun anubhava karannāk men anubhava karati. tavada (nirā) ginna ovunaṭa himi navātænayi
